TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ScoAudioState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.ScoAudioState Connected = int32(1)

summary.para: Value for extra or indicating that the SCO audio channel is established

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.ScoAudioState Connecting = int32(2)

summary.para: Value for extra EXTRA_SCO_AUDIO_STATE or EXTRA_SCO_AUDIO_PREVIOUS_STATE indicating that the SCO audio channel is being established

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.ScoAudioState Disconnected = int32(0)

summary.para: Value for extra EXTRA_SCO_AUDIO_STATE or EXTRA_SCO_AUDIO_PREVIOUS_STATE indicating that the SCO audio channel is not established

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.ScoAudioState Error = int32(-1)

summary.para: Value for extra EXTRA_SCO_AUDIO_STATE indicating that there was an error trying to obtain the state
